sense.def:
To provoke someone
pomeni nekoga namerno razjeziti, da bi se začel vesti napadalno.

seg.quote: Ray was trying to provoke them into fighting.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
provokes a violent or unpleasant reaction
, povzroči nasilen ali neprijeten odziv.

seg.quote: The petition provoked a storm of criticism.
